name: Drawer
description: Low-income Family of 5 with an newborn child is in need of a drawer to store their clothes. Father works as a delivery driver.

name: TV
description: Recipient is a 2 person household consisting of a Single mother and her 16year old son. The mother is the main income earner for the household. Their TV has since broken down and they lack necessary funds to replace the item. Provision of a TV would assist greatly for the mother and son.

name: Cabinet
description:
The client, who recently relocated to a new house, needs a cabinet to store and organize her belongings, which are currently dispersed across the living room.

Client is living alone and is struggling with her finances. She is unable to work due to poor health condition

contact.org: NTUC Health Cluster Support @ Bukit Merah

name: Mattress

name: Dryer
description: Family consists of a single mother and her 2 sons (17 and 23). She is a full-time caregiver to her younger son, who is diagnosed with a neurodevelopmental condition. Her older son is currently serving his national service. The family relies on social assistance for their daily living needs. The family would greatly benefit from a dryer for their convenience.

name: TV
description: This is a young single mother (24 year old) with a 6 year old daughter. Mother is currently doing ad-hoc delivery jobs which does not pay well. She has been having difficulty in maintaining her employment due to caregiving of her child. They recently moved out from the crisis shelter to their own rental flat and is in need of furnishings in their house. The TV is daughter's request to mother as she wishes to watch TV for entertainment. Donor to kindly arrange for own delivery as client is unable to afford delivery fees.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelin Wong

name: Dryer
description: *** UREGNTLY REQUIRED!! *** Sunbeam Place @ Children's Society requires a clothes dryer urgently for the home. The current one is spoilt and they required it urgently. Any brand and preferably larger in size for big loads. Delivery is required to be arranged by kind donor, please click to donate so that we can get in touch with you soon. We thank you for your kindness in advance!

name: Toaster
description: Client is a 44-year-old single father with a daughter aged 15, and two sons aged 10 and 9 years old. He is presently caring for his two sons who is living with him. While concerns remain for the children's care arrangements, client has been open to support and services from stakeholders. Currently, he is requesting for a toaster to help in his care for his two sons.

passiton.name: 4 slice toaster
passiton.description: Used toaster. Fits 4 slices bread. No defects. Used only for bread. Will be cleaned thoroughly before donation.
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview
